casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Larry J. EDWARDS. No. 82P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Larry J. Edwards, Norlina, for Edwards, Larry J. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of March 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016." ERVIN, J. recused.
